    • load

      public static Properties<String,String> load(File source)
      Loads properties from the specified file.
      Parameters:
      source - The file from which to load the properties.
      Returns:
      A Properties object containing the loaded properties.

    • load

      public static Properties<String,String> load(File source, boolean autoRefresh)
      Loads properties from the specified file with an option for auto-refresh.
      Parameters:
      source - The file from which to load the properties.
      autoRefresh - If true, the properties will be automatically refreshed when the file is modified. There is a background thread to check the file last modification time every second.
      Returns:
      A Properties object containing the loaded properties.

    • load

      public static Properties<String,String> load(InputStream source)
      Loads properties from the specified InputStream.
      Parameters:
      source - The InputStream from which to load the properties.
      Returns:
      A Properties object containing the loaded properties.

    • loadFromXml

      public static <T extends Properties<String, Object>> T loadFromXml(File source, Class<? extends T> targetClass)
      Loads properties from the specified XML file into the target properties class.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the target properties class.
      Parameters:
      source - The XML file from which to load the properties.
      targetClass - The class of the target properties.
      Returns:
      An instance of the target properties class containing the loaded properties.

    • loadFromXml

      public static <T extends Properties<String, Object>> T loadFromXml(File source, boolean autoRefresh, Class<? extends T> targetClass)
      Loads properties from the specified XML file into the target properties class with an option for auto-refresh.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the target properties class.
      Parameters:
      source - The XML file from which to load the properties.
      autoRefresh - If true, the properties will be automatically refreshed when the file is modified. There is a background thread to check the file last modification time every second.
      targetClass - The class of the target properties.
      Returns:
      An instance of the target properties class containing the loaded properties.

    • loadFromXml

      public static <T extends Properties<String, Object>> T loadFromXml(InputStream source, Class<? extends T> targetClass)
      Loads properties from the specified XML InputStream into the target properties class.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the target properties class.
      Parameters:
      source - The InputStream from which to load the properties.
      targetClass - The class of the target properties.
      Returns:
      An instance of the target properties class containing the loaded properties.

    • store

      public static void store(Properties<?,?> properties, String comments, File output)
      Stores the specified properties to the given file with optional comments.
      Parameters:
      properties - The properties to store.
      comments - The comments to include in the stored file.
      output - The file to which the properties will be stored.

    • store

      public static void store(Properties<?,?> properties, String comments, OutputStream output)
      Stores the specified properties to the given OutputStream with optional comments.
      Parameters:
      properties - The properties to store.
      comments - The comments to include in the stored output.
      output - The OutputStream to which the properties will be stored.

    • store

      public static void store(Properties<?,?> properties, String comments, Writer output)
      Stores the specified properties to the given Writer with optional comments.
      Parameters:
      properties - The properties to store.
      comments - The comments to include in the stored output.
      output - The Writer to which the properties will be stored.

    • storeToXml

      public static void storeToXml(Properties<?,?> properties, String rootElementName, boolean ignoreTypeInfo, File output)
      Stores the specified properties to the given XML file.
      Parameters:
      properties - The properties to store.
      rootElementName - The name of the root element in the XML.
      ignoreTypeInfo - If true, type information will be ignored.
      output - The file to which the properties will be stored.

    • storeToXml

      public static void storeToXml(Properties<?,?> properties, String rootElementName, boolean ignoreTypeInfo, OutputStream output)
      Stores the specified properties to the given XML OutputStream.
      Parameters:
      properties - The properties to store.
      rootElementName - The name of the root element in the XML.
      ignoreTypeInfo - If true, type information will be ignored.
      output - The OutputStream to which the properties will be stored.

    • storeToXml

      public static void storeToXml(Properties<?,?> properties, String rootElementName, boolean ignoreTypeInfo, Writer output)
      Stores the specified properties to the given XML OutputStream.
      Parameters:
      properties - The properties to store.
      rootElementName - The name of the root element in the XML.
      ignoreTypeInfo - If true, type information will be ignored.
      output - The Writer to which the properties will be stored.

    • xml2Java

      public static void xml2Java(String xml, String srcPath, String packageName, String className, boolean isPublicField)
      Generate Java code from the specified XML.
      Parameters:
      xml - The XML content as a string.
      srcPath - The source path where the generated Java code will be saved.
      packageName - The package name for the generated Java classes.
      className - The name of the generated Java class.
      isPublicField - If true, the fields in the generated Java class will be public.

    • xml2Java

      public static void xml2Java(File xml, String srcPath, String packageName, String className, boolean isPublicField)
      Generate Java code from the specified XML file.
      Parameters:
      xml - The XML file from which to generate Java code.
      srcPath - The source path where the generated Java code will be saved.
      packageName - The package name for the generated Java classes.
      className - The name of the generated Java class.
      isPublicField - If true, the fields in the generated Java class will be public.

    • xml2Java

      public static void xml2Java(InputStream xml, String srcPath, String packageName, String className, boolean isPublicField)
      Generate Java code from the specified XML InputStream.
      Parameters:
      xml - The InputStream from which to generate Java code.
      srcPath - The source path where the generated Java code will be saved.
      packageName - The package name for the generated Java classes.
      className - The name of the generated Java class.
      isPublicField - If true, the fields in the generated Java class will be public.

    • xml2Java

      public static void xml2Java(Reader xml, String srcPath, String packageName, String className, boolean isPublicField)
      Generate Java code from the specified XML Reader.
      Parameters:
      xml - The Reader from which to generate Java code.
      srcPath - The source path where the generated Java code will be saved.
      packageName - The package name for the generated Java classes.
      className - The name of the generated Java class.
